title: df: overlay: Implement middleware/RBAC chains of ordered applications of overlays
body:
Enable stacking of chains of validation opertions executed in defined
sequence or with ordered registred prirority via overlays. Probably done by
modifying input/conditional flow of each operation with data type
targeted.

Take for instance the following (off eb9eaf9fffaa59011c024f4a6fb0d05ca13bf6af)

